explain: An Oregon couple announced their pregnancy in a rap video created using the theme of 90s sitcom The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air, which has received over 1.7 million views on YouTube.

The parents, Jesse and Melissa Meek, announced their pregnancy in a video set to the theme song of '90s TV show "The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air." They conceived the child after two months and confirmed the pregnancy with a sonogram. The video was viewed over 1.7 million times on YouTube.
Family and friends enjoyed watching the creative video, as it was more entertaining than they initially anticipated.
